title: ISplitLineFeatureData.IGetSplitTargets
description: Gets the faces or bodies to split.

parameters.name: Count
parameters.description: Number of faces or bodies to split

returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of faces or bodies to split VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
Call
ISplitLineFeatureData::GetSplitTargetsCount
before calling this method to determine the size of the array for this method.
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
for additional details.
